about_the_game: Face off in a legendary event! As an ‘Ancient’ you will battle for supremacy and domination. Use your ‘Ancient’ magic to control legends from another universe for power, or to survive the destruction! As the World surrenders to the chaos you may stand alone against the forces of evil. Send your 5 bravest Legends and collect more to improve your team, as you need power to stop the destruction and chaos! Battle to level 5, and create or join a clan. Increase your network of other ‘Ancients’ to rise the ranks in competitive play. With other game modes to come later!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Additional Notes: Gnome desktop environment running on top of X11 windowing system Other configuration and user environment as provided stock with the supported distribution (such as Kernel or Compositor) Nvidia and AMD GPUs using Nvidia official proprietary graphics driver or AMD Mesa graphics driver.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting backend requires Xcode. Targeting Apple Silicon with IL2CPP scripting backend requires macOS Catalina 10.15.4 and Xcode 12.2 or newer.

name: Forgotten Legends

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting backend requires Visual Studio 2015 with C++ Tools component or later and Windows 10+ SDK.

short_description: Forgotten Legends is a virtual trading card game, based off of MMO/MOBA style combat. You will need to build a team that can win together and take Victory from your enemies!
